readable.title: 3685372942_6ae935b34e
readable.content: A man with no shirt is standing in a parade wearing a plastic flower necklace . A man without shirt but wearing a flower necklace is holding a flag pole A shirtless man wearing bracelets and a garland , carrying a pole . A young topless man carries a Brazilian flag whilst wearing a colorful bracelet on his arm and flowers around his neck The young man with the colorful flowered lei and colorful bracelets is holding a flag .
